name: Return Of Dancing Plague
description:
Unfortunately, the Dancing Plague returned in 2021 though it is not the first time that the epidemic has occurred. 

Firstly, some people thought it was a dance obsession in 1518 when a woman began to dance without any justification in a French city, the number of people who became obsessed with dance started more and more to increase then. The woman used to participate every day with more than 10 people. They kept and kept dancing, hysterically, they weren't able to stop until it was officially considered a disease

Here we are today in 2021, the Plague returns to "Paris", the city of love and fashion. 

Lionel is the hero of our story, he is not really a hero because; he was one of the victims that the disease afflicted.

Your goal is to make people dance, not run away from them. Our advice to you in this difficult situation is to.. well, dance and make them dance too and

Infect everyone in Paris!



THIS GAME WAS MADE BY @ROUHAYEM & @CODBY FOR TAFRA GAME JAM, THE VISUALS, SOUNDS, PROGRAMMING...ETC ALL THEIR OWN.
